text: Manish Pandey (born September 10, 1989) is an Indian cricketer who is known for his aggressive batting and brilliant fielding skills. He is a right-handed batsman and occasionally bowls right-arm off-break. Pandey has represented the Indian national cricket team in One Day Internationals (ODIs) and Twenty20 Internationals (T20Is). Category:1989 births Category:Indian cricketers Category:Living people
title: Manish Pandey
